purpose: Consistent API response helpers with safe error wrapping, returning results as typed objects or arrays
keyExports: apires.ts exports — API result types and helpers
catchAsArray namespace — wrap async calls, returning [error, result] tuple arrays
catchAsObj namespace — wrap async calls, returning { error, result } objects

keyPatterns.name: catchAsArray error handling
keyPatterns.description: Use catchAsArray.run(fn) to execute async operations and receive a [error, value] tuple, avoiding try/catch boilerplate

keyPatterns.name: catchAsObj error handling
keyPatterns.description: Use catchAsObj.run(fn) to execute async operations and receive a { error, value } object for named access

architecture.keyDesign: Flat workspace layout (no src/ directory); provides two error-wrapping patterns so callers can choose their preferred style
